Uses of Class
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.vmplacementgroups.VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups

Packages that use VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups
Package
Description
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.vmplacementgroups
A package with VM allocation policies that support requests with VmPlacementGroups.

  • Uses of VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.vmplacementgroups

    Subclasses of VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.vmplacementgroups
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups_LRRL
    An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups that uses the left-to-right and right-to-left concepts depending on the number VMs of the VmPlacementGroup that is requested to be placed.
    class 
    VmAllocationPolicyChicSchedAllPack
    An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups that implements an all-pack configuration of the topology-aware Chic-sched scheduler published in [1].
    class 
    VmAllocationPolicyFirstFitWithPlacementGroups
    An extension of the VmAllocationPolicyBestFitWithPlacementGroups that places the individual VMs of a group request according to First Fit algorithm instead of Best Fit.
